title: The Teaching triad (TEFC)
creator_credit: Jerry Maybrook, Lane Wipff, Susan Rafin, AIMS Instructional Media and Dubnoff Center
brief_description: Focuses on the direct involvement of the educational therapist with the family of the handicapped child as well as the child himself. Defines the teacher parent child component as the teaching triad and demonstrates ways teachers and parents together can help to bring the child to his optimal level of development.
